Packages that use StopCondition 
Package Description

Simulation engine classes and interfaces.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.stop
Stop mechanism, for deciding when the simulation finishes.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.stop
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for stop conditions for information propagation simulations.
